text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump THREAD: After touting hydroxychloroquine nearly 50 times, Trump hasn't mentioned it in a week. But his sales pitch triggered shortages, and chronically ill Americans who need the drugs are now going to increasingly dangerous lengths to get them. My latest: https://t.co/SomoxWxV6O
